resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105765</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105765</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201853</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Power of the Pen </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie der Feder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance du crayon lecteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência da pena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza della penna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη της πέννας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencia de la pluma</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will create petitions addressing their biggest concern relating to tobacco globally.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer erstellen Petitionen ihr 
größtes Interesse in bezug auf Tabak global adressierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants créeront des pétitions adressant 
leur plus grand souci concernant le tabac globalement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes criarão petições que dirigem-se a
seu interesse mais grande que relaciona-se ao tabaco global.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi creeranno le petizioni che richiamano 
la loro preoccupazione più grande per quanto riguarda il tabacco 
globalmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν τις αιτήσεις 
εξετάζοντας τη μεγαλύτερη ανησυχία τους σχετικά με τον καπνό 
συνολικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes crearán peticiones que tratan su 
preocupación más grande referentes a tabaco global.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201853</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105765</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/power-of-the-pen</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
